1.0.name: wordpress/internet-explorer-alert
1.0.description: Internet Explorer Alert is created to Alert visitor to use Recommended Browser like Firefox, Chrome etc. That is if anyone browse your site with Internet Explorer, he/she will alert by your site to use Recommended web Browser. Also, they will get the Recommended web Browser download link! By Default, It Detect and Alert for Internet Explorer 7 or Later. You can Customize the Internet Explorer Detection Easily from Settings of your Admin Panel. Also you can set the alert message if you wish; otherwise it will display the Default Alert Message. For More, Visit Plugin Site. Demo at http://shariarbd.com(Will work only if visit the site with Internet Explorer). Plugin is created by Md. Shariar.
